experience.description: â€¢ Oversaw the recruitment process for hiring PGT and TGT faculty for public schools in Delhi NCR,    successfully filling 95% of the positions within the deadline by utilizing Naukri.com and referral    programs.â€¢ Implemented a new onboarding process during the pandemic to reduce the orientation time.â€¢ Developed and conducted sensitivity training programs for handling students with special needs    and young students during the online mode of education.â€¢ Established a system of providing psychological first aid services to employees in times of crisis.â€¢ Facilitated communication and collaboration between senior leadership and employees to enhance   organizational effectiveness and achieve efficient outcomes
